reviews.review: Играл на Windows 8.1. Очень хорошо идет, отличная скорость, ничего не тормозит, не лагает, отличная локализация! Все нравится, не пожалел, что именно купил лицензию, а не скачал пиратку. Безусловно рекомендую! Спасибо, и успехов!

рекомендую
Great Game recommend all to have this game.

I played this somewhat frequently for about year and a half before Csgo came out. Csgo has overtaken Source substantially in popularity. Source was very mod friendly and csgo isnt because they want you to buy skins. This game is very mod friendly and GO is not but this game unlike go doesn't have friend lobbies only old school server lists. You can't host your own games other than to play by yourself with bots. GO has some Key features that make it the superior game overall with more content and it continues to get updated but GO also has had issues with cheating and continues to clamp down against any 3rd party app use that interacts with GO and you cant mod Csgo at all. Changing the menu and using skins not from the steam market place? you can forget it.

Old news but GO has much different recoil and weapon firing patterns than any other counter strike game so if you got use to a certain older game you would have to be prepared to relearn it. I railed against the changes in GO but overtime as I played more of it and less source now it feel's fine still not great but fine. Meanwhile in source the hitboxes are too big, bigger than they are in csgo but I like the gunplay more.

Overall though it would be tough to recommend this in 2020 over playing the newer GO for free. It is on sale at least twice a year for dirt cheap if you want to check it out, took many years for the price to come down. I paid 20 dollars for it full price in 2011 it was my first, second or third purchase on steam.
I played almost 1/2 hour straight and I can tell you this game is gooder than % 1000000 of all games created in past and future.
this is still better than CoD:Ghosts
